modal-content.accessibility:
<stack16>
<title2>Accessibility Statement</title2>
<textDarkGray>InReach‚Äôs open source technology is built for the diverse LGBTQ+ community, including users with disabilities.</textDarkGray>
<textDarkGray>The free InReach App is available on web (desktop and mobile), and native iOS and Android. Beginning with the launch of our latest redesign (June 2023), InReach will strive to meet <linkAccessibility>Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) level AA criteria.</linkAccessibility></textDarkGray>
<textDarkGray>At InReach, we strive to make our tech platform accessible for as many users and devices as possible in alignment with our mission to serve all LGBTQ+ people facing persecution or discrimination.</textDarkGray>
modal-content.disclaimer:
<stack16>
<title2>InReach Disclaimer</title2>
<textReg>The InReach team will do its best to confirm the eligibility and basic facts about service providers listed on this website. However, we cannot guarantee the viability or capabilities of any such providers. Consequently, InReach assumes no responsibility for the actions of providers listed on this website and users who contact any such providers do so at their own risk.</textReg>
</stack16>

no-reviews: No reviews have been submitted for this organization yet. Be the first to share your experience!
none-apply: None of these apply to me

password-reset.email-body: Click the following link to reset your password:

privacy-statement-body: <textDarkGrayCentered>At InReach, we recognize that preserving online anonymity is a life-or-death issue for many LGBTQ+ people. That's why the free InReach App (our web app, native iOS app, and native Android app) is designed to prioritize protecting users' safety and confidentiality online.</textDarkGrayCentered>
We do not require any personally identifiable information to use the free InReach App.
Users who choose to create a free InReach user account have the option to share the following demographic information via an anonymous online survey:

<textDarkGray><listGroup><listItem>Birth year</listItem>
<listItem>Country of origin</listItem>
<listItem>LGBTQ+ identity (sexual orientation and gender identity)</listItem>
<listItem>Race/ethnicity</listItem>
<listItem>Immigration status</listItem>
<listItem>Current location</listItem></listGroup></textDarkGray>
All of this sensitive information is stored anonymously and not connected to any single individual user or user account.*

<textUtility4>(*The only exception is the Local Community Reviewer user account type, which leverages any demographic information collected to enhance Local Community Reviewers‚Äô volunteering experience and impact. For Local Community Reviewer accounts, we require location and all other demographic information is optional but would be tied to their user record. This data would only be visible outside of InReach staff if the Local Community Reviewer chooses to make it visible through their account privacy settings. Sharing a public-facing profile, will help other users‚Äô to feel more confident in your reviews.)</textUtility4>

<textDarkGray>Understanding our user demographics can help us to quantify our impact, raise funds, and evaluate future product decisions. We appreciate users voluntarily sharing this information with us, and we take these steps to protect your privacy and anonymity.</textDarkGray>

<textDarkGray>InReach uses Google Analytics to anonymously analyze and track App usage data (e.g., user searches and other behavior) in the aggregate. Google Analytics is GDPR compliant and does not collect any personally identifiable information and anonymizes all data collected. Users cannot be identified and are never tracked across websites.</textDarkGray>

<textDarkGray>InReach also uses Vercel Analytics to analyze web vitals and performance. Vercel Analytics provides site usage information without being tied to, or associated with, any individual visitor or IP address. The recording of data points is anonymous and the Analytics feature does not collect or store information that would enable Vercel to reconstruct a browsing session across pages or identify a user.</textDarkGray>
privacy-statement-foot: <linkPolicy>Read our full privacy policy for more information</linkPolicy>

sign-up.header:
<group>
<emojiLg>üåà</emojiLg>
<title2>$t(words.sign-up)</title2>
<textDarkGray>Welcome to the world's first tech platform matching LGBTQ+ people facing persecution or discrimination with safe, verified resources.</textDarkGray>
</group>
sign-up.lcr-error1:
Unfortunately, you do not meet the current eligibility requirements to be a Local Community Reviewer.
<Switch>Click here to create a standard account.</Switch>
sign-up.lcr-error2: You must read & review the Local Community Reviewer page.
sign-up.lcr-screen1a: I have personal lived experience accessing local services in my community.
sign-up.lcr-screen1b: I have experience helping LGBTQ+ clients access local services in my community.
sign-up.lcr-screen1c: I have experience helping LGBTQ+ loved ones/family members access local services in my community.
sign-up.lcr-screen1none: None of these apply to me.
sign-up.lcr-screen2: In which country are you located?
sign-up.lcr-screen3: I have reviewed the Local Community Reviewer page on InReach's website and I meet the requirements.
modal-body: <title3>What type of account would you like to create?</title3>

sign-up.success: You've signed up for an account!

sign-up.user-exists-header: You may already have an account.
sign-up.verify-email: Before you can start using your new account, you must verify your email address. Check your inbox and click the link in the message.

survey.birthyear-req-value: Year must be between {{year1}} and {{year2}}, i.e 2005
survey.launch-item1: <Bold>Why do we ask?</Bold> Understanding our user demographics can help us to quantify our impact, raise funds, and evaluate future product decisions.
survey.launch-item2: <Bold>Safety-first:</Bold> Your answers are stored anonymously and not connected to you as an individual user or to your user account.
survey.launch-title: Please take a few minutes to tell us about yourself in our anonymous user survey.
survey.question-2-title: What is your country of origin?
survey.thank-you-message: The information you shared helps us to improve our product.

verified-information-detail: The information on this page was last updated {{dateString}}. InReach prioritizes accuracy and user safety, and updates all information regularly.  For more information on our vetting process, please visit our Vetting Process page on InReach.org.

verify-account.verified-body: <Text>Your account has been verified! Please <LoginModal>login</LoginModal> to start using InReach's additional features.
